postBodyContent: on their way to steal ur boy, ur girl, and ur money

thewillowbends replied:

 I seriously can’t believe they let him walk around that entire goddamn movie dressed like a slave.  Poor kid probably hasn’t showered…well, ever.

Exactly. We never get to see anyone taking proper care of him after he left Shmi. It seems like everyone just assumed he’d be fine. He was left to sleep on the floor, no explain to him what would happen to him, no one told if he was supposed to stay with Padmé or follow Qui-Gon until the very last second, no one explain how this worked in this new and strange planet and no one thought “hey this dirty child might use a proper shower and some new clothes”. Maybe I’m being too harsh but it’s something so basic I’ve a hard time finding excuses for everyone involved in the situation. They had the clothes and the fabrics, they had the water and they had a starship filled with adults and servants. “They were too busy to notice” is not a good enough excuse to let the kid who saved them all run around (in a goddamned battle!!!!) wearing rags.

The sad part is Anakin was only cleaned after he traded his slave outfit for a new slave outfit jedi robe.

A little progress shot of a piece I started before school consumed all of my free time. RIP me.
I feel like if you asked Draco why he’s so in love w Harry, he’d just silently show you this picture and you’d understand.
